title: Black Bean & Spinach Enchilada Casserole
steps: Heat the oil in a large skillet over medium heat, then wilt the spinach and set aside.

Layer in a 9 x 13 inch casserole dish: (1/3) of the salsa, (6) of the tortillas, (1/3) of the salsa, baby spinach, black beans, chili powder, goat cheese, (6) of the tortillas, (1/3) of the salsa, shredded cheddar cheese.
Cover with foil and bake for 20 minutes.
Remove foil and bake for 15 minutes more, or until cheddar cheese is bubbly and browning.
